string-array.name: oak_introduction_speech_dialogue
string-array.item: Welcome to the world of Pokémon!
My name is Oak! But you can just call me Prof! This world is inhabited by creatures called Pokémon!
For some people, Pokémon are pets. Others use them for fights.
Myself… I breed Pokémon as a profession.
I have developed a special type of Pokémon training to help me with my own fitness regime.
This means I can benefit the other trainers in our world by providing them with powerful Pokémon!
First, what is your name?
~~PromptingForPlayerName~~
Ah, so, your name is pn$v!
Let\ ’s start getting you in shape with some Pokémon breeding!
Remember that with enough hard work, even a Magikarp can turn into the powerful Gyarados, and you can do the same!
~~PromptingForPlayerCurrentFitness~~
Ah, so you currently consider yourself to be cf$v…
Now for your first steps in to the wonderful world of Pokémon breeding!
Take a deep breath and get ready, your fitness regime is about to begin!

string-array.name: oak_prompt_for_name_dialogue
string-array.item: First, what is your name?

resources.string: 10,000 steps left until you can hatch your egg
10,000 steps left until your egg is hatched

string-array.name: desired_activity_level
string-array.item: I want the game to be comfy and easy to play
I\'ll do my best, I want no regrets
I want to be the very best
